MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  We are arranging to have engineers investigate the fault, and we hope to have your electricity restored by 14-DEC-2020 14:15.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the TD8 area of Jedburgh, affecting properties in Castlegate and surrounding areas. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1:45pm due to repairs required to our underground electricity network on Market Place and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:15pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:18pm on Monday, 14 December 2020
